name: hello-sqlite
description: A simple Node app with SQLite as a database management system, instantly up and running.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run start-ganache"
scripts.start-ganache: ganache-cli -m "fortune cherry broom april game spice produce flight piece sunny gather silly" -f "https://ropsten.infura.io"
